website_summaries.verdict: Get right in the action with Kai's Fire Mech building kit from the LEGO Ninjago movie. Includes 944 pieces, including 6 minifigures.
pros: Pieces to complete Fire Mech with mini-figure cockpit, and posable arms and legs
Mech has shooters and 2 non-shooting fire blasters
Comes with 6 minifigures: Kai, Zane, Lauren, Henry, Hammer Head and Jelly
Measures 14"H x 4"L x 8"W. For ages 9 to 14
cons: The Mech's legs lack knee joints for stability, so it can fall over easily during play

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed and angry
customer_reviews.text: Can not be any more angry right now. Item came in retail packaging and is destroyed, the box is taped shut all around it very poorly, and this is a present. It looks like someone kicked it around for an hour and then dropped it off at my house. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brants

customer_reviews.title: Large LEGO worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 9 year old’s birthday. He assembled it fully on his own and it only took him around 4-5hours. He worked on it straight through only breaking to eat. He was so excited about it and absolutely loves the finished product. It’s the largest LEGO set he’s ever put together. It is however very fragile so you play with it with gentle hands and keep away from younger siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena E

customer_reviews.title: Six year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old grandson. He loved putting it together. With intense focus it only took him 20 days.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than we thought, breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old who is a LEGO master. He has over 50 different LEGOs and this is by far the largest he owns. It took him approximately 6 hours to build, over the course of 2 days. He loves it, but finds it hard to play with because the arms are frail and fall apart easily. Because of this he is constantly fixing it and gets frustrated. I personally do not care for this one, and would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Fun, big, frail
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed, large assembly. Spent near 9 hours spread over a week with my 10 yr old daughter assembling this massive mech. My one complaint is that most the joints and some of thesections are extremely frail, resulting in a need to reassemble certain sections numerous times before finishing, or any time you move it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucid Drem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy. Lego is sure different from when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 9 year old son since he's a big Ninjago fan. When I first saw how many pieces there were I thought "no way!" But the instructions were super simple for such a complex and detailed toy. So much so that my son put about 98% together himself after dismissing me after the first few minutes saying "I got it from here." Delivery was quick and the product was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Yost

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived sealed but once opened we discovered that one of the bags had been cut open and several pieces were missing. We ended up having to take pieces from other sets to replace the missing ones.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old Grandson and he stayed up most of the night (Christmas Eve) building it. He was so proud to show me. Great gift for the builder in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Reichard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool for the (discounted) price
customer_reviews.text: It's big, it's fun, it's Lego. I had to ding it a star since for the first time ever (and we have plenty of Lego sets) it had two of the wrong pieces!!! Fortunately you can quickly/easily go on Lego's website and request replacement pieces. They showed up in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My sons love it. Easy enough for my 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: My sons love it. Easy enough for my 7 year old son to build by himself. Good looking and tons of moving parts, shooting disc etc.
customer_reviews.author: S.B

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO kit.
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my 14 year old for his birthday. He pick his gift. He had it completed in 2 hours. We have recently started putting together the 3D puzzles. I should say I started and as fast as the kits get here the race is on to see who can get their course done to earn another kit. Forget the tv they are building away.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hodapp

customer_reviews.title: Quality Set!
customer_reviews.text: This Mech is great quality, and worth the money. It is pretty sturdy once built, my 5yr old got it for his birthday and loves it! The set did take me about 4hrs uninterrupted to put together tho. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Quirion

customer_reviews.title: Great mech build
customer_reviews.text: This set was a very fun build. Its challenging enough for an adult, but my 5 year old helped me also and it kept his attention. I wish the knees were bendable and would allow it to pose in more positions. Its very sturdy and has a nice selection of figures to go with it. Price point is great also.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Neat Build - Great set to add to a mech collection
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up on a very healthy sale, so the value was unquestionable. Built it while watching a 3hr movie, and it fits great on my shelf. The only con is the original price is a bit high, but well worth it if you are patient.
customer_reviews.author: j.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect toy to bribe a little boy!
customer_reviews.text: I spent 3 hours to put it altogether and sent it to my 5 year old nephew, he loves it very much and give me a big kiss! Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MIAO

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8yo son this past Christmas. It's really neat and has great detail. It stands up on it's own very well and all the extra figures are a bonus. Great Lego mech!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this and put it together as soon as he opened the gift on his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: R K Early

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson loves Lego. He has them all lined up on dressers in the spare bedroom at my house rather than the one he lives in. I just purchased him another one. I am going to have to get him a showcase because I am running out of dresser space.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Jackson

customer_reviews.title: If you love building mechs...check out this set
customer_reviews.text: Ninjago makes great mech sets...almost the size of the lego Voltron set released in 2018 but not as complex or expensive...my 13yr old son built this in about 2hrs and loved it. Proudly displayed on his shelf with his other big builds....definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: nick ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for lego toy however son (8) loved it and it took about 45 minutes to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for lego toy however son (8) loved it and it took about 45 minutes to assemble. Had some playability though had a few days of fun From it. need to make this and most legos movable

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego purchase

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as our "Santa" present and it came completely sealed yet missing key pieces. My son was in tears because he could not finish without these pieces that were unique to this set. When we tried to order the pieces the lego website was not running properly and we have no idea how long it will take before he can get the pieces and complete the build. Very disappointing this holiday season especially at this price-point.

product_meta.title: LEGO NINJAGO Movie Fire Mech 70615 Building Kit (944 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Get set for sizzling battle action with this huge and highly posable THE LEGO NINJAGO MOVIE mech. The Fire Mech features an opening minifigure cockpit, 2 shoulder disc shooters and 2 arms with non-shooting fire blasters. Includes 6 minifigures with assorted weapons—including Kai's katanas and Zane's bow and arrow—to offer even more thrilling role-play possibilities.
feature_bullets: Build your own Fire Mech, complete with opening minifigure cockpit, posable arms and legs, two non-shooting fire blasters with translucent fire-style elements, two shoulder disc shooters and more
Featured in THE LEGO NINJAGO MOVIE
Includes 6 minifigures: Kai, Zane, Lauren, Henry, Hammer Head and Jelly
LEGO NINJAGO brick building toys are compatible with all other LEGO construction sets for creative building
Fire Mech measures over 14-inch high, 4-inch long and 8-inch wide
944 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 9 and 14 years old

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars715 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
